thread.title: Kinnaur from Delhi in October or November
thread.title_full: Kinnaur from Delhi in October or November

author: ameyan
title: Kinnaur from Delhi in October or November
text: # 1 Hi guys! a friend and I are thinking of kinnaur for 5-7 days in october or november this year. we definitely want to stop in sangla and sarahan, but everything else is open. we don't really like crowded places and would love to stay in a village by the river sort of thing. since there are only two of us we would likely not be able to afford taxis everywhere alas. my questions: 1. what's a good route? we're totally open to suggestions. 2. what are must see places? 3. how much can we do by bus? though taxi info would also be useful so we could see if it makes more sense because of time constraints. 4. where are good places to stay? thank you!
